titleStmt.title: King Charles his welcome home, or, A congratvlation of all his loving subiects in thankfulnesse to God for His Maiesties safe and happie returne from Scotland, 1641 by Iohn Bond ...
titleStmt.author: Bond, John, 1612-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. L. for T. Bates and F. Coules ...,
